title: N172 Old Judge Cards (6) for Sale or Trade

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Cards (6) for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
A few N172 Old Judge cards for sale or trade:

N172 Ward Batting (HOF)  $400
N172 Flint SGC10 $140
N172 George SGC10 $125
N172 Toole $125
N172 Healey AGC10 $135
N172 Tiernan Raw $100

Scans can be viewed at [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url] (then go to "Other 19th Century" listing).

All other categories are updated and are also for sale or trade. Quite a bit of variety.

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

I'm looking for the following ten (10) N172 Old Judge Boston players:
Bennett, Tom Brown, Daley, Hanlon, Morrill, Nash tagging Radbourn, Hardy Richardson, Pop Smith, Wheelock, Kelly-Portrait.  Also looking for 20 T204 cards listed in T204 category listing.  

Thanks,
Mike
